cs572

Class Ast

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs572.Ast
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypedI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDeclarationAst, AbstractExpAst, AbstractStatementAst, AbstractTypeAst, ClassAst, InitDeclaratorAst, ProgramAst

    abstract class Ast
extends java.lang.Object
implements TypedI
    Abstract class representing all Asts. All Asts will have a line number and column number giving the approximate source position of the root of the Ast. All concrete AST's will have a rubric specifying the category of the AST. All AST's can be pretty-printed in a simple-minded way to a string.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Ast.Position
      Represent source position.

      Constructor which uses some sub-Ast t to approximate source position.
      Ast(java.lang.String rubric, org.antlr.v4.runtime.Token t)
      Constructor which uses token t to approximate source position.
